description.author: Levent Erkok
description.synopsis: SMT Based Verification: Symbolic Haskell theorem prover using SMT solving.
description.description:
Express properties about Haskell programs and automatically prove them using SMT
(Satisfiability Modulo Theories) solvers.

For details, please see: <http://leventerkok.github.com/sbv/>
description.category: Formal Methods, Theorem Provers, Bit vectors, Symbolic Computation, Math, SMT
